# GitHub Agents Directory

This directory contains configuration files for GitHub AI Agents, including GitHub Copilot Agents.

## Files

- **`copilot-instructions.md`**: Custom instructions for GitHub Copilot Agents working with this repository. This file provides guidance on:
  - Project architecture and key components
  - Development workflows and commands
  - Code conventions and best practices
  - Common troubleshooting scenarios

## Maintenance

The `copilot-instructions.md` file should be kept in sync with `.github/copilot-instructions.md` to ensure consistent behavior across different GitHub Copilot interfaces.

## References

- [GitHub Copilot Documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot)
- [Model Context Protocol](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/)
